entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Matagami
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:12 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Matagami Airport 10:00 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -3.2°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 74 %

Dewpoint: -7.1°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning in the morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
